nodes.id: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
国家互联网信息办公室
中央网络安全和信息化领导小组办公室
en: Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国网络信息内容管理、网络安全和信息化发展的综合协调机构，实行一个机构两块牌子，列入中共中央直属机构序列。
description.en: A comprehensive coordination agency for internet content management, cybersecurity, and informatization development in the People's Republic of China. It operates under the model of 'one institution with two names' and is listed in the sequence of institutions directly under the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会

zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会
中央网络安全和信息化领导小组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的决策和议事协调机构，负责网络安全和信息化领域的顶层设计、总体布局、统筹协调、整体推进、督促落实。其前身为中央网络安全和信息化领导小组。
description.en: A decision-making and coordinating body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, responsible for top-level design, overall layout, coordination, overall promotion, and supervision of implementation in the fields of cybersecurity and informatization. Its predecessor was the Central Leading Group for Cyberspace Affairs.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机关。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室主任、国家互联网信息办公室主任，兼任中央宣传部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission and the Cyberspace Administration of China, and concurrently as Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部
en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的综合职能部门。
description.en: The comprehensive functional department of the CPC Central Committee in charge of ideology-related work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室副主任、国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission and the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室副主任、国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission and the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室副主任、国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission and the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室副主任、国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission and the Cyberspace Administration of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
en: Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管工业、通信业、信息化等事务。其部分信息化推进和网络信息安全协调职责于2011年划转给新成立的国家互联网信息办公室。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for industry, communications, and informatization. Some of its responsibilities for promoting informatization and coordinating network information security were transferred to the newly established Cyberspace Administration of China in 2011.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的办事机构，是推动中国媒体对外介绍中国的机构。国家互联网信息办公室成立初期曾在此机构加挂牌子。
description.en: An administrative office of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for promoting China's media to introduce China to the world. The Cyberspace Administration of China was initially co-located with this office.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革方案
en: Plan for Deepening Reform of Party and State Institutions

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月由中共中央印发的文件，旨在改革党和国家机构设置。该方案将多个中央领导小组改为委员会，并调整了部分机构的管理关系。
description.en: A document issued by the CPC Central Committee in March 2018 aimed at reforming the setup of Party and state institutions. The plan changed several central leading groups into commissions and adjusted the management relationships of some institutions.

nodes.id: 国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心

zh-cn: 国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心
en: National Computer Network and Information Security Management Center

description.zh-cn: 中国的网络安全技术支撑机构。2018年，其管理关系由工业和信息化部调整为由中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室管理。
description.en: China's technical support institution for cybersecurity. In 2018, its management was transferred from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology to the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

nodes.id: 数据出境安全评估办法

zh-cn: 数据出境安全评估办法
en: Measures for Security Assessment of Data Cross-Border Transfer

description.zh-cn: 由中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室公布的法规，旨在规范数据出境活动。
description.en: Regulations published by the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission to regulate cross-border data transfer activities.

nodes.id: 清朗·打击网络谣言和虚假信息

zh-cn: 清朗·打击网络谣言和虚假信息
en: Qinglang · Crackdown on Online Rumors and False Information

description.zh-cn: 由中央网信办于2022年9月发起的为期3个月的专项行动，旨在整治网络谣言和虚假信息。
description.en: A three-month special campaign launched by the Cyberspace Administration of China in September 2022, aimed at rectifying online rumors and false information.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任首任国家互联网信息办公室主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the first Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央网络安全和信息化领导小组办公室主任、国家互联网信息办公室主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Director of the Office of the Central Leading Group for Cyberspace Affairs and the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室主任、国家互联网信息办公室主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission and the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾兼任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who concurrently served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾兼任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who concurrently served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees public security work nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾兼任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who concurrently served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾兼任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who concurrently served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家互联网信息办公室专职副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a full-time Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家互联网信息办公室专职副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a full-time Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家互联网信息办公室专职副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a full-time Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家互联网信息办公室专职副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a full-time Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

description.zh-cn: 2023年组建的中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会管理的国家局，负责协调推进数据基础制度建设，统筹数据资源整合共享和开发利用等。承接了原中央网信办的“数字中国”规划和建设部门职能。
description.en: A national bureau managed by the National Development and Reform Commission of the People's Republic of China, established in 2023. It is responsible for coordinating the construction of the basic data system, and coordinating the integration, sharing, development, and utilization of data resources. It took over the functions of the former 'Digital China' planning and construction department from the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission Office.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 经中华人民共和国国务院批准，设立国家互联网信息办公室。
description.en: The State Internet Information Office was established with the approval of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室是中央网络安全和信息化委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission serves as the working body for the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室是中共中央办事机构，列入中共中央直属机构序列。
description.en: The Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission is a working body of the CPC Central Committee, listed in the sequence of institutions directly under the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国家互联网信息办公室是国务院办事机构，并经国务院授权负责互联网内容管理执法。
description.en: The Cyberspace Administration of China is an agency of the State Council and is authorized by the State Council to be responsible for internet content management and law enforcement.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
relationships.target: 国务院新闻办公室

description.zh-cn: 国家互联网信息办公室成立初期，不另设新的机构，在国务院新闻办公室加挂牌子。
description.en: In its early days, the Cyberspace Administration of China did not set up a new institution but was co-located with the State Council Information Office.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 国家互联网信息办公室成立时，将原由工业和信息化部承担的信息化推进和网络信息安全协调职责划入该办公室。
description.en: When the Cyberspace Administration of China was established, it took over the responsibilities for promoting informatization and coordinating network information security from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会
relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 2014年，中央网络安全和信息化领导小组（委员会前身）成立，下设办事机构中央网络安全和信息化领导小组办公室，由国家互联网信息办公室承担具体职责。
description.en: In 2014, the Central Leading Group for Cyberspace Affairs (predecessor of the Commission) was established with a working body, the Office of the Central Leading Group for Cyberspace Affairs, whose duties were carried out by the Cyberspace Administration of China.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革方案
relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据该方案，中央网络安全和信息化领导小组改为中央网络安全和信息化委员会。
description.en: According to this plan, the Central Leading Group for Cyberspace Affairs was transformed into the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革方案
relationships.target: 国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心

description.zh-cn: 该方案将国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心的管理关系由工业和信息化部调整为由中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室管理。
description.en: This plan adjusted the management of the National Computer Network and Information Security Management Center from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology to the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

relationships.source: 国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心
relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 自2018年3月起，国家计算机网络与信息安全管理中心由中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室管理。
description.en: Since March 2018, the National Computer Network and Information Security Management Center has been managed by the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
relationships.target: 数据出境安全评估办法

description.zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室（国家互联网信息办公室）公布了《数据出境安全评估办法》。
description.en: The Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission (Cyberspace Administration of China) announced the 'Measures for Security Assessment of Data Cross-Border Transfer'.

relationships.source: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
relationships.target: 清朗·打击网络谣言和虚假信息

description.zh-cn: 中央网信办决定开始在全国范围内启动为期3个月的“清朗·打击网络谣言和虚假信息”专项行动。
description.en: The Cyberspace Administration of China decided to launch a three-month special campaign called 'Qinglang · Crackdown on Online Rumors and False Information' nationwide.

relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 国家数据局成立后，承接了原由中央网信办承担的国务院“数字中国”规划和建设部门职能。
description.en: After its establishment, the National Data Administration took over the functions of the State Council's 'Digital China' planning and construction department, which were previously held by the Office of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission.

relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室
中国共产党中央委员会宣传部

description.zh-cn: 兼任中央宣传部副部长。
description.en: Concurrently serves as Deputy Head of the Central Propaganda Department.

中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 兼任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: Concurrently served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 兼任国家网信办副主任时，任工业和信息化部副部长。
description.en: While concurrently serving as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China, he was Vice Minister of Industry and Information Technology.

relationships.target: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 兼任国家互联网信息办公室副主任。
description.en: Concurrently served as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

relationships.target: 公安部

description.zh-cn: 兼任国家网信办副主任时，任公安部副部长。
description.en: While concurrently serving as Deputy Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China, he was Vice Minister of Public Security.
